column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Best deep dish I have ever had.  Tried Gino and UNOs
column2: but prefer Lou's by a lot.  Recommend there meat deep dish with their awesome sausage
column3: and their veggie deep dish.  Get butter crust in both.  Only been to Lou's twice
column4: and second trip the meat pizza wasn't hot
column5: just warm - it was still good
column6: but not as good as it should have been.  The veggie was better
column7: and it was hot.  First time visit I had thought sausage pizza was a bit better than veggie.  Can't wait to try the new AZ location.  Now AZ has best deep dish & best thin crust @ pizzeria Biancos!!!
